programme.title: Guardians Of The Galaxy
programme.desc: Peter Quill, kidnapped from the earth by space pirates while he was still a child, escapes from the planet Morag, carrying with him a mysterious yet valuable orb and, as a result, is followed closely by the assassin of Ronan the Accuser who wants it for himself. Quill knows that he cannot take on Ronan alone in a battle in space, so he decides to put together a team of brave and heroic individuals with superpowers, calling them the Guardians of the Galaxy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Penguins Of Madagascar
programme.desc: Taking up from where the 2012 movie of the 'Madagascar' franchise left off, Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private find themselves in Italy, all set for a new adventure. Tom McGrath, Chris Miller, Conrad Vernon and Christopher Knights give their voices to the four delightful penguins who join forces with a spy organisation, The North Wind, and gear up to impede the evil Dr. Octavius Brine from exterminating the world. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: Goku sets out on a race against time in order to fulfil his grandfather's dying wish. He must collect a set of seven magical orbs before the vengeful King Piccolo can misuse them. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Percy Jackson, the son of Posedion, decides to uphold Thalia's sacrifice. Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a kind-hearted street urchin, falls in love at the first sight of Princess Jasmine, the princess of Agrabah. When he stumbles upon a magic lamp, Aladdin uses the powers of the magical Genie to make himself a wealthy prince so that he can marry the princess. On the other hand, danger is lurking around Agrabah in the form of an evil sorcerer, Jafar. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Monster Hunt 2
programme.desc: (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Director Patrick Read Johnson's adventurous family comedy 'Baby's Day Out' narrates the story of three wannabe kidnappers, Eddie (Joe Mantegna), Norby (Joe Pantoliano) and Veeko (Brian Haley) disguise themselves as photographers, enter a huge mansion and make away with Baby Bink (Adam and Jacob Worton), millionaires Bennington (Matthew Glave) and Laraine (Lara Flynn Boyle) Cotwell's son. But Baby Bink turns out to be more than a hand full for the crooks. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Popular British Chef Nigella Lawson gives the contestants a detailed description of her favourite dish and nothing else. The home chefs must then recreate it perfectly. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: John Wick is excommunicated after killing a crime lord and a hefty bounty is set on him. In order to save himself, John sets out to find an influential but reclusive man. Meanwhile, Winston and the Bowery King have to face the consequences of helping John kill the crime lord. (Film - Action)

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Bobby Hayes and his aide Nick Walker, who work as detectives for the Boston Police Department, steal gold while they are on duty. Bobby kills Nick so that he doesn't return the booty to the officials during a raid. In the afterlife, Nick is hired by Mildred Proctor, the director of Rest In Peace Department (R.I.P.D.), a group of deceased police officers. Nick is assigned the responsibility to fight against the renegade ghosts. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a kind-hearted street urchin, falls in love at the first sight of Princess Jasmine, the princess of Agrabah. When he stumbles upon a magic lamp, Aladdin uses the powers of the magical Genie to make himself a wealthy prince so that he can marry the princess. On the other hand, danger is lurking around Agrabah in the form of an evil sorcerer, Jafar. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Kevin, a man with dissociative identity disorder, has 23 distinct personalities. He abducts three teenage girls and takes them to an underground facility. While the girls struggle to rescue themselves, they take advantage of some of the personalities of Kevin and discover the truth about the terrifying 24th personality, the Beast. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail named Theo dreams of winning the Indy 500 race. But his obsession with speed makes him an outcast in the slow-paced snail community. Later, an accident fuses Theo's DNA with nitrous oxide, gifting him incredible speed and accuracy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Undisputed II Last Man Standing
programme.desc: After being framed for possessing drugs, George is sent to a Russian prison, where he realizes that boxing against inmate Yuri Boyka is the only way out. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Downhill
programme.desc: (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: Popular stars Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, Miguel Ferrer and BD Wong lend their voices to recount a unique Chinese tale of a girl who takes an untrodden path of masquerading as a man just to save her land from the evil invaders. On gauging that her ailing father is in no position to defend his territory, 'Mulan' decides to take his place and lead her army to victory, but an unexpected company awaits her. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Planes
programme.desc: Dusty, a cropduster dreams of becoming a great air racer. Along with his friend, Chug, a fuel truck, Dusty practises flying manoeuvres, in order to qualify for the Wings Across the World race. A night before the qualifiers, Dusty asks Skipper, an old navy war plane, for assistance. Skipper refuses to help Dusty. The next day at the race, Dusty is laughed upon by the audience but manages to wow them with his smooth flying. He just manages to qualify for the main race. It is then that Skipper asks Dusty the reason he wants to participate in the race and satisfied with his answer, he decides to help Dusty. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Cars
programme.desc: A big league racing car, Lightning McQueen, learns an important lesson in life when he rams into the pavements of Radiator Springs and is ordered to repave the roads again. (Film - Animation)

programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Upgrade
programme.desc: After he is paralysed and his wife is killed in a brutal attack, Grey Trace, a technophobe, is approached by Eron, a billionaire, to implant an AI chip in his body to help him become mobile. This artificial intelligence called STEM bestows Grey with heightened senses and abilities and leads him to avenge the death of his wife. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: In the third instalment of the 'Johnny English' series, English, a retired M17 agent, currently working as a geography teacher, is entrusted with a secret mission. He teams up with his old aide Bough to investigate a cyber-attack that revealed the identity of Britain's intelligence agents. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Popular British Chef Nigella Lawson gives the contestants a detailed description of her favourite dish and nothing else. The home chefs must then recreate it perfectly. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Six Days Seven Nights
programme.desc: Robin Monroe's vacation with her boyfriend turns into a nightmare when she finds herself stranded on a deserted island with a pilot whom she dislikes. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who wants peace to prevail in the kingdom. She is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan, who wants to be the king. In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Director Lee Unkrich's long time association with Pixar comes handy as he directs the Academy-award winning third instalment in the 3D computer animated comedy trilogy 'Toy Story'. With an ensemble cast consisting of actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen rendering their celebrated voiceovers, this visually appetising and emotionally enchanting animation takes viewers in the mysterious world of anthropomorphic toys Woody, Buzz and the gang, who find themselves in the company of untamed, uncivilised tots. Woody and Buzz must plan their great escape with the help of their newly found friends. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: American Horror Story
programme.desc: Rita's group decides to split up to increase their odds of survival. Later, Ray leaves Chet to die after confessing about an incident in college. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Ant-Man And The Wasp
programme.desc: With a few days left of his house arrest, Scott Lang dons the suit to help Hank and Hope 'the Wasp' Pym, who are on a risky quest to bring back Janet, Hope's mother, from the quantum realm while evading a powerful ghost-like being. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Cars
programme.desc: A big league racing car, Lightning McQueen, learns an important lesson in life when he rams into the pavements of Radiator Springs and is ordered to repave the roads again. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Toy Story 4
programme.desc: Woody takes upon himself to protect Bonnie's new favourite toy, Forky, who is experiencing an existential crisis as he considers himself to be trash. Later, while the family is on a road trip, Forky jumps out of the RV and Woody pursues him. He convinces him to return, but on their way back they find several lost toys and an old friend. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: An immensely powerful ancient mutant rises again and wishes to cleanse humankind in order to create a new world order. He recruits some powerful mutants, making them believe that mutants are superior to humans and it is their right to rule. To counter him, Raven tries to pull Charles out of his depressed state and lead a team of X-Men. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Winning the 77th Academy award for the Best Animated feature, the film directed by Brad Bird, revolves around a family of superheroes who are forced to hide their superpowers and lead mundane lives due to several lawsuits filed against them. Although, Mr. Incredible's desire to help people drags the whole family into a battle with the evil Syndrome who has been responsible for murdering countless retired superheroes. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: After being fired from the Anti-Villain League, Gru sets out to meet his long-lost twin, Dru, for the first time. But he is soon forced to team up with his brother to take down Balthazar Bratt, a former child star, whose obsession with his 80s character turns him into a supervillain. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: In this reboot of the 'The Mummy' franchise, Sergeant Nick Morton and Corporal Chris Vail uncover the mummy of the betrayed Princess Ahmanet, who unleashes mayhem across London in a bid to reclaim her destiny. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Tim is envious of his baby brother. But his animosity towards him doesn't last long when he learns that this baby, who calls himself The Boss, can talk and behave like an adult and is on a mission to stop Puppy Co from replacing the love for babies with puppies. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: The contestants are divided into three teams and are asked to cook a three-course meal, with each course featuring one of Yotam Ottolenghi's flavour bombs. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: On a special CIA mission, Dutch and his team of commandos must save themselves from an extra-terrestrial warrior deep in the Central American jungle. (Film - Action)

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: The Alpha Omega, a paramilitary faction, attacks Caesar's clan, killing his wife and the oldest son. Angered, Caeser rallies his army to take revenge from Colonel, the man behind the faction. Battling his own dark instincts, he decides to lead a final confrontation that will determine the future of the planet. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise Of The Silver Surfer
programme.desc: Comic book adventure follows Fantastic Four superheroes Reed (Ioan Gruffudd), Sue (Jessica Alba), Johnny (Chris Evans) and Ben (Michael Chiklis) as they battle the enigmatic Silver Surfer (Doug Jones), who travels the earth preparing it for total destruction. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When NASA learns that an enormous asteroid is all set to destroy Earth, it recruits Harry, a deep sea oil driller, and his crew, in order to drill a hole in the asteroid and plant a nuclear bomb in it. In the midst of this, Harry must also deal with his daughter's lover, who is a part of the mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Directed by Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff, 'The Lion King' follows the life of the endearing young lion Simba who is the heir to the throne of his father Mufasa who rules the animal kingdom. But Simba's evil uncle Scar plots to kill him and his father to occupy the throne. The plan succeeds partially with Mufasa being bumped off by Scar. Simba manages to escape and returns to his birthplace on becoming an adult only to see Scar as the ruler. He immediately plots to take over the kingdom with his pals. But wily Scar is no minnow. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Rule Of Three
programme.desc: A father repeatedly visits the motel room where his daughter was last seen before her abduction in the hope of solving the mystery and ultimately finding her. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Downhill
programme.desc: (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jack Skellington, a being from Halloween Town, finds Christmas Town and is instantly enchanted. The situation becomes riveting when his obsession with Christmas leads him to abduct Santa Claus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the 12 ancient animal signs of the 'Chinese Zodiac' stolen, Asian Hawk, brought to life by the phenomenal Jackie Chan who also doubles up as the director of this adrenaline-pumping action film, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Flik, an odd ball of an ant, may be pint sized but he has tremendous courage. When the anthill he resides in is threatened by arrogant grasshoppers, he sets out to create an army to deal with them, recruiting the most incompetent bugs of course. A man with exceptional humour inducing skills, Dave Foley lends his voice to play Flik. Directors John Lasseter, and Andrew Stanton procure some of the biggest names on television and film for 'A Bug's Life'. Julia Louis-Dreyfuss, Kevin Spacey and Hayden Pannettiere are but a few. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: The contestants are divided into three teams and are asked to cook a three-course meal, with each course featuring one of Yotam Ottolenghi's flavour bombs. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe
programme.desc: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realise that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Forty years after his confinement, Michael Myers, a serial killer, escapes while being transferred to a new facility. He traces back an old victim, Laurie, whom he had attempted to kill in his last assault. As Laurie is forced to face her worst fears, the truth about Michael's escape is revealed. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Guardians Of The Galaxy
programme.desc: Peter Quill, kidnapped from the earth by space pirates while he was still a child, escapes from the planet Morag, carrying with him a mysterious yet valuable orb and, as a result, is followed closely by the assassin of Ronan the Accuser who wants it for himself. Quill knows that he cannot take on Ronan alone in a battle in space, so he decides to put together a team of brave and heroic individuals with superpowers, calling them the Guardians of the Galaxy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail named Theo dreams of winning the Indy 500 race. But his obsession with speed makes him an outcast in the slow-paced snail community. Later, an accident fuses Theo's DNA with nitrous oxide, gifting him incredible speed and accuracy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Cooking legend Massimo Bottura presents his take on the classic dish mac 'n' cheese and has the losing team from the previous round compete in the elimination challenge. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: A decade after his father's death in the Battle of the Breach, Jake Pentecost forfeits his Jaeger training and makes a living off the black market. But the rise of a new Kaiju threat finds him teaming up with his adoptive sister, Mako Mori, co-pilot Nate Lambert and 15-year-old Jaeger enthusiast Amara Namani to prevent a global catastrophe. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Mercenaries William and Tovar are imprisoned in the Great Wall by a faction called the Nameless Order, which battles alien monsters that attack every sixty years. Once there, William ends up befriending Lin, a young commander, and decides to assist the Nameless Order in accomplishing their selfless mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: Wade Wilson AKA Deadpool learns what it means to have a family as he attempts to save Russell, an orphaned mutant, who is being hunted by Cable, a genetically enhanced soldier from the future trying to prevent the death of his wife and daughter. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe
programme.desc: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realise that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Cars 2
programme.desc: (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
programme.desc: The Guardians are hired by the Sovereign, an alien race, to retrieve their batteries, but Rocket ends up stealing them. In the chase that ensues, they're rescued by Peter's father, and he sets out to discover his parentage, only to reunite with his friends to save the galaxy once again. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Alice In Wonderland
programme.desc: Based on the classic novel, this film follows 19-year-old Alice, who discovers a magical world strikingly similar to the nightmares she had as a child. As she meets and befriends one bizarre character after the other, she realises that it is her destiny to end the tyranny of the evil Red Queen by defeating the Jabberwocky. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Thing About Harry
programme.desc: Sam, a young gay man, is forced to share a ride with his high school enemy, Harry. However, things soon change between them when Sam learns that Harry is pansexual. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Legendary assassin Jason Bourne uncovers mysteries of his past, which puts him in the cross-hairs of a superkiller. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Undisputed III: Redemption
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Cooking legend Massimo Bottura presents his take on the classic dish mac 'n' cheese and has the losing team from the previous round compete in the elimination challenge. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A possible assassination of the Chinese premier and a conspiracy involving the MI-7, KGB and the CIA force the bosses at MI-7 to recall their brave but unconventional agent, Johnny English, who after a failed mission is seeking a shot at redemption. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Directed by Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff, 'The Lion King' follows the life of the endearing young lion Simba who is the heir to the throne of his father Mufasa who rules the animal kingdom. But Simba's evil uncle Scar plots to kill him and his father to occupy the throne. The plan succeeds partially with Mufasa being bumped off by Scar. Simba manages to escape and returns to his birthplace on becoming an adult only to see Scar as the ruler. He immediately plots to take over the kingdom with his pals. But wily Scar is no minnow. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: Lawyer Fletcher Reede (Jim Carrey) lies constantly, a habit thats decimated his marriage to Audrey (Maura Tierney) and threatens to alienate his son, Max (Justin Cooper). But when Max makes a birthday wish that somehow comes true, Fletcher suddenly finds hes incapable of lying which sends him into a panic as hes set to try a crucial case. Jennifer Tilly also stars in director Tom Shadyacs Golden Globe nominated comedy. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: The headquarters of the Kingsman organisation is destroyed by Poppy Adams, a psychotic leader of the world's largest drug cartel, the Golden Circle. Although Eggsy and Merlin survive the attack, they need help to go against the resourceful drug cartel and contact their allies in the United States. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: Three years after Jurassic World is destroyed, Claire Dennis, its former manager, is recruited to save its dinosaurs from an impending volcano. She enlists the help of Owen Grady, a velociraptor trainer. But the duo soon discovers that the dinosaurs may be in a bigger peril than they anticipated. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Cars 3

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Sci-fi director Roland Emmerich's 'Independence Day' is one of the highest-grossing films of all time and has also won the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects. It follows the efforts of a computer whiz (Jeff Goldblum) who foresaw the aliens' intent, a hot-shot pilot (Will Smith), the U.S. President (Bill Pullman) and a ragtag group of survivors who unite to save mankind after an alien race invades Earth and destroys most of its major cities. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and his crew set sail into the third chapter of this surreal, action-packed series that narrates the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp). This installation finds Captain Sparrow stuck in Davy Jones' locker after his encounter with the kraken. Now Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) and Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) must team up with the notorious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) and pirates from around the world to save Jack Sparrow and fight the evil East India Trading Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Hollywood action superstar Jason Statham essays the role of Frank Martin, a former Special Forces operator, who is hired by unknown clients to transport goods, human or otherwise, from one place to another. He is known to be the best in the business, as he transports anything without asking any questions and is always on time. However, complications arise when a job goes astray and he has to save the life of his female cargo. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Monsters University
programme.desc: Mike and Sulley, two monsters, join the Monsters University in order to graduate as the scariest monsters on the planet. While Mike is serious about his ambitions, his peer Sulley whiles away most of his time. A special programme Roar Omega Roar becomes the perfect opportunity for them to showcase their skills. But when they play mischief with Dean Abigail Hardscrabble, she forbids them from participation. Mike decides that he will participate in the Scare Games challenge and takes a vow to leave school in case he loses. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Mufasa, the noble lion king of the Pride Lands of Africa, is killed trying to save his young son from a trap set by his evil brother Scar. He then declares himself king and tries to kill Simba. However, Simba escapes and grows up in the company of outcasts Timon and Pumbaa, a meerkat and warthog. Years later, Simba has a chance encounter with Nala the lioness who urges him to return to the pride and take his rightful place as the king. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Monster Hunt 2
programme.desc: (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Avengers: Endgame
programme.desc: The actions of Thanos leave the universe in ruins with exactly half of all life disintegrated. The Avengers, however, refuse to give up and assemble again to try and bring back all the people that were lost, ready to do whatever it takes to undo the chaos caused by the Mad Titan. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: In the wake of a calamity of epic proportions, Manny is separated from Ellie and Peached and is left with Diego, Sid and his grandmother on an iceberg. As they attempt to return to his family, the motley friends are apprehended by pirates. (Film - Animation)

Although Eggsy and Merlin survive the attack, they need help to go against the resourceful drug cartel and contact their allies in the United States. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the 12 ancient animal signs of the 'Chinese Zodiac' stolen, Asian Hawk, brought to life by the phenomenal Jackie Chan who also doubles up as the director of this adrenaline-pumping action film, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Sci-fi director Roland Emmerich's 'Independence Day' is one of the highest-grossing films of all time and has also won the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects. It follows the efforts of a computer whiz (Jeff Goldblum) who foresaw the aliens' intent, a hot-shot pilot (Will Smith), the U.S. President (Bill Pullman) and a ragtag group of survivors who unite to save mankind after an alien race invades Earth and destroys most of its major cities. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: Keeping with his famous trend of aestheticizing violence, Quentin Tarantino brings a war film starring Brad Pitt, Christoph Waltz and Melanie Laurent. Set in the backdrop of World War II, 'Inglourious Basterds' traverses the scheming and plotting of two groups that aim to assassinate prominent Nazi political leaders. But a single night changes the fate of everyone involved when the two groups cross each other's paths. (Film - War)

programme.desc: The team use a fire extinguisher to tackle a rattlesnake infestation while Carlos helps Michelle look into Iris's disappearance. Later, Owen learns about a new treatment and adopts a dog. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: 9-1-1: Lone Star
programme.desc: An accident at a gender-reveal party causes the woman to go into premature labour. Further, Jud's father severely injures himself and the team helps a father-son duo with a stuck up toy. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Jaws 3-D
programme.desc: A group of marine biologists attempt to capture a young great white shark. Later, chaos follows when its ferocious mother breaks into the marine centre in order to avenge the death of its baby. (Film - Horror)

programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Toy Story 4
programme.desc: Woody takes upon himself to protect Bonnie's new favourite toy, Forky, who is experiencing an existential crisis as he considers himself to be trash. Later, while the family is on a road trip, Forky jumps out of the RV and Woody pursues him. He convinces him to return, but on their way back they find several lost toys and an old friend. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Glass Houses
programme.desc: Carrie Dawson is a teenage babysitter who learns about a humiliating family scandal and the person who is suspected to be the reason for it. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: Based on a Marvel Comics character, 'Ant-Man' has Paul Rudd playing the superhero whose suit gives him the power to shrink in size. He is tasked with using his abilities to stop Darren from creating a destructive weapon with the same technology. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Circus performer Holt Farrier returns home after the First World War and is tasked with caring for a newborn elephant with oversized ears, Dumbo. The circus is undergoing a financial crisis but when it is discovered that Dumbo can fly, vultures close in under the pretext of making him an icon. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who wants peace to prevail in the kingdom. She is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan, who wants to be the king. In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When NASA learns that an enormous asteroid is all set to destroy Earth, it recruits Harry, a deep sea oil driller, and his crew, in order to drill a hole in the asteroid and plant a nuclear bomb in it. In the midst of this, Harry must also deal with his daughter's lover, who is a part of the mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Beauty And The Beast
programme.desc: Belle, a beautiful young woman, agrees to live with the Beast in exchange for the return of her abducted father. Soon, Belle discovers that her hideous captor is actually an enchanted prince. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Spies In Disguise
programme.desc: Lance Sterling, a secret agent, finds himself transformed into a pigeon. He then sets out with his associate Walter to stop a villain who is using Sterling's disguise to carry out a dangerous plan. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Undisputed III: Redemption
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: American Horror Story

programme.title: American Horror Story

programme.title: American Horror Story
programme.desc: Following an arrest, the spirits at the camp kill anyone who trespasses. In the meantime, Richard goes to prison and Mr Jingles makes a new life for himself. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Snowfall

programme.title: Snowfall
programme.desc: The LAPD opposes Franklin's growing operation while Teddy reluctantly deals with Gustavo's mess. Further, a fight turns personal for Andre. (TV Show - Crime)

programme.title: Snowfall

programme.title: 9-1-1: Lone Star
programme.desc: The team lands up at a male strip club and later Paul and Josie part ways. Meanwhile, Owen deals with chemotherapy and the resultant erectile dysfunction. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: 9-1-1: Lone Star
programme.desc: Billy, a former captain of 126, tries to steal Owen's job while the crew helps Mateo, who suffers from dyslexia, pass the test. Later, an injured dog leads the team to a man trapped by a harvester. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: 9-1-1: Lone Star
programme.desc: The team tries to rescue a bull trapped by a vehicle while Owen trains for his physical ability test. Later, Owen saves Billy's life, which in turn rebounds on him in a good way. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: 9-1-1: Lone Star
programme.desc: The team use a fire extinguisher to tackle a rattlesnake infestation while Carlos helps Michelle look into Iris's disappearance. Later, Owen learns about a new treatment and adopts a dog. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: 9-1-1: Lone Star
programme.desc: An accident at a gender-reveal party causes the woman to go into premature labour. Further, Jud's father severely injures himself and the team helps a father-son duo with a stuck up toy. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Chi

programme.title: The Chi
programme.desc: The Williams family spins out of control. Meanwhile, Emmett and Tiff make plans to move in with Jada while Ronnie is reminded of his past. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Chi
programme.desc: Emmett allows his father and his insecurities to rule his life. Also, mayoral contenders Douda and Camille Halloway face off against each other. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: An unmanned, half-mile-long freight train hurtles towards a town at breakneck speed. An engineer and a young conductor, who happen to be on the same route, must race against time to try and stop it. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: James Clayton (Colin Farrell) is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. His intelligence and unconventional attitude attract the attention of veteran Walter Burke who squires him through the Agencys difficult training courses and helps him to quickly rise through the ranks. Clayton is then given a special assignment, to root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jack Skellington, a being from Halloween Town, finds Christmas Town and is instantly enchanted. The situation becomes riveting when his obsession with Christmas leads him to abduct Santa Claus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Flik, an odd ball of an ant, may be pint sized but he has tremendous courage. When the anthill he resides in is threatened by arrogant grasshoppers, he sets out to create an army to deal with them, recruiting the most incompetent bugs of course. A man with exceptional humour inducing skills, Dave Foley lends his voice to play Flik. Directors John Lasseter, and Andrew Stanton procure some of the biggest names on television and film for 'A Bug's Life'. Julia Louis-Dreyfuss, Kevin Spacey and Hayden Pannettiere are but a few. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Childhood friends Rafe and Danny become army pilots and meet Evelyn, a navy nurse. However, the three of them later find themselves in the middle of the attack on Pearl Harbour during World War II. (Film - War)

programme.title: Alice In Wonderland
programme.desc: Based on the classic novel, this film follows 19-year-old Alice, who discovers a magical world strikingly similar to the nightmares she had as a child. As she meets and befriends one bizarre character after the other, she realises that it is her destiny to end the tyranny of the evil Red Queen by defeating the Jabberwocky. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Starring action stalwarts Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger, the movie revolves around the exploits of a security system expert who is imprisoned in a high-tech prison and must figure out an ingenious way to escape. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and his crew set sail into the third chapter of this surreal, action-packed series that narrates the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp). This installation finds Captain Sparrow stuck in Davy Jones' locker after his encounter with the kraken. Now Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) and Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) must team up with the notorious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) and pirates from around the world to save Jack Sparrow and fight the evil East India Trading Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: Keeping with his famous trend of aestheticizing violence, Quentin Tarantino brings a war film starring Brad Pitt, Christoph Waltz and Melanie Laurent. Set in the backdrop of World War II, 'Inglourious Basterds' traverses the scheming and plotting of two groups that aim to assassinate prominent Nazi political leaders. But a single night changes the fate of everyone involved when the two groups cross each other's paths. (Film - War)

programme.title: Commando - A One Man Army
programme.desc: Commando of the Indian army, Karanvir Dogra (Vidyut Jammwal) escapes from China (where he was in the custody of the Chinese army after being falsely implicated as an Indian spy and mercilessly tortured thereafter) to India (albeit in miraculous circumstances). Here, at a small town close to the Punjab-Himachal Pradesh border, he bumps into Simrit (Pooja Chopra), who has run away from her home after facing a lot of harassment from the eccentric and much-feared local politician, AK74 (Jaideep Ahlawat). Thus begins the action extravaganza of a cat and mouse game. (Action)

programme.title: Chaalbaaz
programme.desc: Twins separated at infancy are brought up differently. One weak, one strong. One day, they end up at each others house. Their life is not the same anymore. (Action,Comedy,Drama,Family,Musical,Thriller)

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Roopa, a beautiful young village belle is much loved by the villagers of Chandanpur. Chandanpur celebrates a huge Mela every year and this year, they invite a Minister to inaugurate it. In an assassination attempt that follows, a massacre takes place. Chandanpur is devastated and Roopa's family gets wiped out. She vows revenge. Into her life enter two men, the gregarious Kishan and the volatile Shankar, causing much upheaval in their relationship. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Gunaah
programme.desc: Tough cop Prabha (Bipasha Basu) is haunted by the demons of her past. Being an illegitimate daughter of a prostitute, she has had a very bad childhood and there once occurred an incident in her life when she was driven to the point of committing a murder. But today, now that she is a cop, she believes that she can clear her conscience by reforming a criminal. Prabha's life is turned topsy-turvy with the entry of Aditya (Dino Morea), who is a good person at heart but was forced to take the path of crime due to the wrong doing of the system. Prabha goes to Aditya's house to nab him, but gets carried away when she sees him bathing. Aditya slips from under her vigilant eyes and a hasty chase follows. Prabha stays close on the heels of fleeing Aditya. At one point when she is about to fall off the rooftop Aditya stops running and extends his hand to save her. This act makes a great impact on Prabha. Prabha decides to know Aditya's past and find out what prompted him to commit crime in the first place. She decides to reform him but herself gets 'reformed' into loving him in the process. (Drama)

programme.title: Apna Bana Ke Dekho
programme.desc: Jankiraman alias Johny is a hoodlum, known to the local police, has been arrested several times, and lives a poor lifestyle in a city in South India along with his widowed mom. His mother and father had a love marriage, but he died a violent death. She kept her Mangalsutra around his photo frame. Once she talked to a parrot astrologer, who predicted great things in Janikiraman's life, as he will soon be associating with rich people, as well as getting married to a very wealthy girl... (Drama)

programme.title: Sikka
programme.desc: Two close and very wealthy friends, Vijay and Pranlal, decide to cement their friendship to a relationship when Vijay proposes marriage on behalf of his sister, Shobha, with Pranlal's son, Amar. Pranlal agrees, and preparations are on for the marriage to take place. Vijay finds out that Pranlal and his men are using their business as a front for drugs and smuggling, and he decides to cancel the wedding. Pranlal is angry with Vijay, but refuses to give up his criminal career. When Amar finds out about his dad's spurious activities, he kills himself. Pranlal, humiliated and angered, vows to avenge Amar's death, and wants Shobha to be Amar's widow for the rest of her life, which is not acceptable to Vijay. Then Shobha meets with a handsome stranger named Jackie, who rescues her. She offers him employment with her brother's firm, and they fall in love with each other. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Jaan Se Pyara
programme.desc: A man tries to lead a double life as a Cop and at the same time look after his retarded twin brother and devoted mother. But then his dangerous police work comes in the way of his family life causing tragedy. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Jeena Marna Tere Sang
programme.desc: Amar is the son of a millionaire. He decides to avenge on Asha for slapping him in public, but later falls for her. He also discovers the truth about his father. (Romance,Drama,Family)

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: A cold-blooded contract killer hires the services of a cab driver for a full night. He forces the driver to go around Dubai as he keeps finishing off witnesses scheduled to testify against a gangster.

programme.title: Kshatriya
programme.desc: In the arid region of Rajasthan, India; there are two royal families, Mirtagarth and Surjangarh who believes in a religious ritual which states that a warrior from each of these two families will come together annually to have a fierce battle with the winner having to sacrifice a baby buffalo and it will rain in that person's territory. This tradition must be fated to carry on by the future generation as it is a rule of nature set down by their kin. (Action,Drama,War)

programme.title: Hote Hote Pyar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Pinky and Atul alias Bunty are in love with each other, and plan to marry. They, however, run into opposition with their respective families, as their life-partners have already been picked for them. Pinky's dad, a retired Colonel has picked Police Inspector Arjun to be Pinky's groom; while Ajit and Asha, Bunty's dad and mom, have picked Shobha to be Bunty's bride. Both Bunty and Pinky plan to go through with their respective marriages to the partners of their parents' choices, and then eventually divorce them, and then get married to each other. They give in to their parents' choices, and their parents are delighted and both the weddings take place with great pomp and ceremony. Pinky then starts picking fights with Arjun and his mom, and openly insults them; while Bunty also does the same with Shobha. Their plans seem to be going on track, until they come to know that Shobha and Arjun are meeting on the sly. What impact will this have on their plans and their marriage? (Action,Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Juaari
programme.desc: Vijay, a young man, resorts to gambling to free his lover, Shanti, whom Sanga holds captive, but he soon runs out of luck and gets arrested. (Family)

programme.title: Ek - The Power Of One
programme.desc: Mumbai-based Nandkumar Sharma is a high-priced hit-man. He is paid a princely 1.5 Crore Rupees to injure Anna Mhatre, so that the later can get enough 'sympathy' votes to get him elected as the next Chief Minister, but ends up killing him. On the run from the Police, he ends up assuming the guise of Hoshiyarpur's Puran Singh, who has been away from home for the last 18 years, and does succeed in fooling Puran's joint family. But his hopes for settling there appear to be in vain with the arrival of a CBI Team, led by Inspector Mahendra Kumar Rane - who is determined to expose and arrest Nandkumar at any and all costs. (Action,Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Kalyug
programme.desc: The husband of a woman who commits suicide after a run-in with the adult entertainment industry seeks revenge on those who drove her to her death. In doing so, he delves into the world of international human trafficking, eventually traveling across the world to seek out the ringleaders of this horrifying enterprise. (Thriller)

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Pardesi Babu
programme.desc: Pardesi Babu 1998 (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke
programme.desc: Karan Khanna is an orphan and a captain in the Rajputana Armed Forces. He's madly in love with beautiful model Nisha, with whom he plans to tie the knot during his next leave. On the way to... (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Run
programme.desc: This action movie is filled with romance and adventure. As Abhisek fights for his life against the forces of crime and injustice, he meets Bhoomika, who captures his heart. (Action,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: One Two Three
programme.desc: Laxminarayan lives a poor lifestyle in Mumbai along with his widowed mother, Kanta, who wants him to be a successful gangster like Batlabhai, and would like him to kill a few people, make enough money, then get married to Khujli's daughter, Meena. In order to fulfill his mother's wish, Laxminarayan accepts a contract to kill D'Mello Yadav, a Pondi-based gangster, who has stolen a diamond from Batl (Comedy)

programme.title: Dhokha
programme.desc: Post-September 11, 2001, Zaid Ahmed Khan lives a wealthy lifestyle in Mumbai and resides in an apartment at Shanti Kutir, Juhu Tara Road, Mumbai, and works as an Assistant Commissioner of Police. One day terrorists strike at a club, killing 20 people, & critically injuring several others. The Police are put on alert, and Zaid is summoned to Police Headquarters to identify a body. To his shock the body turns out to be that of Sarha, his wife - who was not a victim but was a suicide-bomber. While trying to put his life together, Zaid comes across evidence that Sarha may have had an hand in the killings, and thus intrigued he decides to travel to Nasik to find out what really happened, whether his devout Islamic wife was really a terrorist or the victim of a deep-rooted conspiracy. (Drama,Action,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Lashkar
programme.desc: Professor Anand lives a wealthy lifestyle in Bombay along with his wife, son, Raju, and a sister, Barkha, who will soon get married to Police Inspector Sumeet. Anand gets information that about a drug deal through Raghu, and together he and Sumeet apprehend Sangram Singh, who is arrested, tried in Court, but not found guilty. As a result, Sumeet resigns, and subsequently, Sangram's men break into Anand's house, kill his wife and son, assault Barkha, who is hospitalized, and loses her memory. Anand and Sumeet recruit Bhima, Amar, and Johnny, and they wage war on Sangram and his illegal operations. They do make a huge impact, and even influence Sangram's daughter to go against her dad. Their future plans change drastically when Sangram decides to strike back - this time by targeting each one of his opponents individually, and abducting Barkha. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Shaadi Karke Phas Gaya Yaar
programme.desc: Ayaan lives a very wealthy lifestyle with his married brother, Karan and his wife, Anju; a younger sister, Yamini, and brother, Rahul; his mom, and grandma; and runs a garage. One day he meets with beautiful model, Ahana, and falls head over heels in love with her. She forgets her personal diary at his garage, and through this Ayaan woos, wins her heart, and both get married. Ahana soon finds out that despite of Ayaan's wealth, his family is very conservative and tradition-bound. This causes some bitterness between the newly-weds, which gets worse when she becomes pregnant and wants to abort the child. While visiting her mom on their dog's birthday, Ahana has an accident which results in a miscarriage. Ayaan blames her for losing the child, but his mother convinces him and he apologizes. Few months later, Ahana becomes pregnant again, and that's when she finds out that Ayaan had pulled wool over her eyes through her personal diary... (Romance)

programme.title: The Gentleman
programme.desc: Vijay runs a small business and is also a master thief who is wanted by the cops. But, his motive for committing theft is to build a school where students can get free education and become professionals in their field. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Insan
programme.desc: Amjad is a auto-rickshaw driver in Bombay, and lives with his mother in a small tenement in Bombay's slums. His mother had originally given birth to another son, Munna, who has been missing for several years. She is over-joyed when Munna returns home, and both she and Amjad welcome him, and celebrate. They do not know that Munna is now known as Azhar Khan - a member of a Jihaadi terrorist group, who is now using Amjad and his mother as a cover, in order to carry out a deadly and daring terrorist attack. (Drama,War)

programme.title: Loha
programme.desc: Honest and diligent Police Inspector Amar lives a middle-classed lifestyle in Bombay. In his attempt to arrest bandit Sher Singh, he and Inspector Dayal are attacked, Amar survives, but Dayal gets his legs crushed under a truck and becomes wheelchair-bound. Subsequently, Amar arrests local politician, Jagannath Prasad, who not only gets released without getting charged but Amar gets reprimanded, and decides to resign. Shortly thereafter, Sher Singh hijacks a bus and holds the passengers in exchange for 25 of his jailed associates. Dayal's granddaughter, Seema, is amongst them, and Dayal asks Amar for assistance. Amar, along with ex-convict, Qasim Ali, and Karan, a drug-dealer, does manage to rescue them but differences crop up between the trio and they part ways. Then Amar finds out that Qasim and Karan have masterminded a plan to facilitate the escape of the 25 convicts, and decides to confront them. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Tadipaar
programme.desc: Shankar (Mithun Chakraborty) is sentenced to live outside the limits of the city due to a Police case. One day he happens to rescue a woman in distress from some hoodlums and finds out that her name is Namkeen, who resembles a missing multi-millionaire Mohinidevi (Pooja Bhatt). Shankar asks Namkeen to impersonate Mohinidevi to embezzle her wealth. Namkeen agrees to do so, but the question remains: where is Mohinidevi, and what will happen to Namkeen when she is found? (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Suhagan
programme.desc: Suhaagan is a story about two sisters Janaki and Jyoti who live with their Parents Jamnadas and their mother played by Tanuja. Ramu lives in the same village and makes living by farming. Ramu loves Janaki but Janaki is not that interested in Ramu because she is more attracted to Murli who is much more wealthy than Ramu. Jamnadas prefers Ramu as being Janaki's husband because he thinks he is a good person and will not ask for big dowry. Janaki get married to Ramu and that is when all the trouble starts. (Romance)

programme.title: Anushka
programme.desc: A newly married couple witnesses strange incidents while travelling to a guest house. They feel relieved once they reach their destination, unaware that things are about to get worse. (Thriller)

programme.title: Josh
programme.desc: Shah Rukh Khan and Sharad Kapoor are the leaders of the two rival gangs. Aishwarya Rai is Shah Rukh Khan's twin sister. Shah Rukh is in love with Priya Gill. Chandrachur Singh is Sharad Kapoor's younger brother who studies in a catering college in Bombay. He comes to Goa to visit his brother and plans to go back and start a restaurant there. He sees Aishwarya and falls in love with her. Chandrachur gives up the idea of going back to Bombay and opens a bakery in Goa. When Shah Rukh comes to know about the romance between Aishwarya and Chandrachur, the fight between the gang turns more violent. How the conflict is resolved is the rest of the story. Written by gavin@sunny_deol2009@yahoo.com (Action,Drama,Musical,Romance)

programme.title: Bewafaa
programme.desc: Anjali, living in Canada with her parents, hides her relationship to the musician Raja from her parents. When her sister dies during the birth of twins, she abandons her love, marries the widower Aditja and moves to New Delhi to become the new mother of her sister's children. Three years later, when Raja visits Delhi on his concert tour their love inflames again. (Drama)

programme.title: Bhishma
programme.desc: Paro, her mother, and her brother, Natwar, find an unconscious man near their town. They bring him over to their house, nurse and nurture him back to good health, only to find out that he has the mind of a 12 year of old child, and name him Bhola. Years pass by, Paro has fallen in love with Bhola, for he rescued her from a molester, and both would like to get married. Before that could happen, Bhola is viciously attacked and left for dead by Paro's molester, and is hospitalized. While in hospital, Police Sub-Inspector Abhimanyu Verma finds out that Bhola is not who he claims to be but a homicidal maniac, wanted for killing three policemen - named Bhisma - and is possibly masquerading as a 12 year old child to hide from the police.

programme.title: Kasoor
programme.desc: The film starts with the murder of Priti (Divya Dutta), wife of Shekhar (Aftab Shivdasani), a well-known journalist. Inspector Lokhande (Ashutosh Rana) investigates the case and accuses Shekhar of the murder, saying he has enough evidences to arrest him. Upon getting bail from the court, Shekhar's lawyer tells him that he will not be able to fight his case because he is a corporate lawyer. He asks him to contact Simran Bhargav (Lisa Ray), who is a criminal lawyer to fight his case. (Drama,Mystery,Thriller)

programme.title: Juaari
programme.desc: Vijay, a young man, resorts to gambling to free his lover, Shanti, whom Sanga holds captive, but he soon runs out of luck and gets arrested. (Family)

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Nazar Ke Samne
programme.desc: Umesh is accused of killing a newspaper editor. His wife and mother hire a reputed lawyer named Sangram Singh Sahni, who agrees to be the defense lawyer without charging them any fees. The case is going in Umesh's favor, until a young man named Jai Kumar, comes as an eye-witness and states that he has seen Umesh commit the murder from his balcony right opposite the venue of the murder. Umesh is convicted and sentenced to death. Umesh's sister, Sarita, finds out that Jai was paid to lie, and she approaches him to change his testimony. He refuses, but subsequently relents when he finds out the havoc he has caused in their lives. He approached Advocate Sahni, who attempts to do his best to get a new trial, in vain, though and Umesh is set to die within one week. Now Jai must come up with the person who really killed the Newspaper Editor, and the only clue he has is a photograph of the killer's shoes... (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: China Gate
programme.desc: After witnessing the brutal slaying of her Forest Officer father, Sunder Rajan, at the hands of dreaded dacoit Jageera, Sandhya goes to Colonel Krishnakant Puri and asks for his assistance in bringing an end to Jageera's rule in the Devdurg region. Krishnakant agrees to assist her, and summons about a dozen of his fellow officers and subordinates to assist him. They all assemble at Devdurg with all the necessary ammunitions and arms to combat Jageera, not realizing that Jageera has influence over the local police detachment, who will prevent Puri and his men to possess any guns and weapons. This does not deter Puri and his men, and they continue to stay on in Devdurg and gain the confidence of the villagers. What the villagers do not know that Krishnakant and his men had all been dishonorably discharged from the army for cowardice and retreating when attacked by the enemy. Will Puri and his men abandon Devdurg and let history repeat itself? (Action,Adventure,Drama,Thriller,Western)

programme.title: Loha
programme.desc: Honest and diligent Police Inspector Amar lives a middle-classed lifestyle in Bombay. In his attempt to arrest bandit Sher Singh, he and Inspector Dayal are attacked, Amar survives, but Dayal gets his legs crushed under a truck and becomes wheelchair-bound. Subsequently, Amar arrests local politician, Jagannath Prasad, who not only gets released without getting charged but Amar gets reprimanded, and decides to resign. Shortly thereafter, Sher Singh hijacks a bus and holds the passengers in exchange for 25 of his jailed associates. Dayal's granddaughter, Seema, is amongst them, and Dayal asks Amar for assistance. Amar, along with ex-convict, Qasim Ali, and Karan, a drug-dealer, does manage to rescue them but differences crop up between the trio and they part ways. Then Amar finds out that Qasim and Karan have masterminded a plan to facilitate the escape of the 25 convicts, and decides to confront them. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Zeher A Love Story
programme.desc: Siddharth, a police officer who is soon to be divorced, has an affair with Anna. However, when she is found dead, he realises he got more than he bargained for. (Thriller)

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra lives with his mother, and comes from a very wealthy family. He meets Priya Bhatia, who works with a real estate agency, and instantly falls in love with her. (Thriller,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Desi Kattey
programme.desc: Desi Kattey is the story of two orphans who grow up in a remote village, making country guns to earn their livelihood. The film traces their journey, as they go on to become national level shooters.Desi Kattey is based in a small village of the Kanpur District of Uttar Pradesh, Mungera, which is famous for its geographical location i.e. at the shore of Holy river Ganga and manufacturing cum production of the country made guns, this story is about two young kids Pali and Gyani. Pali and Gyani alike other orphan kids with no support system work as a labor in one of such country made gun manufacturing factory for their survival. (Action)

programme.title: Kaliya No. 1
programme.desc: A tough police officer goes out of his way to bring down the underworld dons and is even ready to murder them in planned encounters to rid the society of evil.

programme.title: Kaali Topi Laal Rumaal
programme.desc: Vijay lives a poor lifestyle in India along with his widowed mom and brother, Raja. When their mom become seriously ill, they do not have money to pay for her medicines, Raja steals some money much to the chagrin of Vijay, who beats him and asks him to leave, but he is unable to save his mother. He decides to return the stolen money but finds the recipient, also named Vijay, has killed himself, leaving behind his near-destitute mother and a sister, Shalu. When told about her son's passing, the mother has a seizure and is hospitalized. When she recovers Vijay decides to not tell her about her son's passing and becomes her son instead. He joins the army and becomes a Commando. He single=handedly captures a terrorist, Master D.D., and holds him in a cell. Vijay then meets with Mohini and gets married to her. What Vijay does not know is that Master D.D. is but a mere pawn, the real kingpin behind this gang is an unknown assailant known only as Kaali Topi Laal Rumaal; that Raja, who has taken to petty crime as a career, is part of this gang and had accepted an assignment to abduct Shalu; and to complicate Vijay's life even more the Indian Army comes across evidence linking Mohini with D.D.'s gang. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Numbri Aadmi
programme.desc: Rana (Amrish Puri) kills Inspector Anand Srivastav, and the only witness is Anand's son, Shankar. Years later, Shankar has grown up and has become a modern Robin Hood of sorts, robs the rich and distributes the wealth amongst the poor, especially a charitable hospital. Shankar comes to know that Rana is still alive, and attempts to avenge his father's death, only to find out that Rana has powerful friends, such as Assistant Commissioner of Police Vijay Pratap (Suresh Oberoi), who not only disbelief Shankar, but will prevent him from doing any harm to Rana. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Mohabbat Aur Jung
programme.desc: Vicky studies in a college in Bombay, and is quite popular with his fellow-students. His fight is against other students, like Bobby and Shakti, who distribute drugs and molest young women at will, without being disciplined by the college authorities. This places Vicky in the bad books of the college, and leads to a students' strike and the involvement of the police. The next day, the college principal, Rajni Bhargav, is found dead, and the police arrest Vicky as they have evidence against him. Vicky's is in more trouble than he thought he would be in as the principal's son is a Police Inspector, Karan, who has sworn to beat the life out of Vicky, as well as sent him to the gallows. Vicky claims he is innocent to no avail. And the only way he can prove his innocence is by escaping from his cell - but that will only enrage Karan as well as make him look even more guilty in the eyes of the law. Vicky has to now to chose between the two and attempt to redeem himself. (Action)

programme.title: Waqt Ki Awaz

programme.title: Krishan Avtaar
programme.desc: Police Inspector Krishan Kumar lives a middle class life with his lovely wife, Suman. Suman gets pregnant and gives birth to a baby girl but tragically passes away, leaving Krishan widowed, heart-broken and devastated. Krishan also encounters a tumor, which is presently inoperable, and may eventually lead to his death. Then a large number of the city's children go missing, and Krishan, together with Inspector Avtaar are assigned to investigate this matter. They are also asked to investigate the murder of fellow police inspector Vishnu Sawant. Krishan's investigation leads him to corruption in his very own department; the involvement of a prominent minister in the government; and the daughter of Inspector Sawant himself. Faced with failing health and vision, Krishan must make his move quickly before he becomes totally disabled from doing any more police work. (Action)

programme.title: Khatron Ke Khiladi
programme.desc: Honest truck driver Balwant watch helplessly as the owners of the trucking company he works for mauled his brother, Jaswant to death. When he lodges a complaint with the police the inspector instead arrest him for this crime; the trucking company owners then burn his house killing his pregnant wife Sumati. Years later Balwant who now calls himself Karamvir operates a court called 'Teesri Adalat' by sentencing wrong-doers to death in a judge and executer style. However he is unaware that Sumati is still alive and has given birth to twins Rajesh and Mahesh; while Mahesh was separated at birth and grows up with Inspector Ram Avtar and his wife - Rajesh is taking care of his mother as she loses her mental balance in the trauma. Rajesh and Mahesh do get to unite as the girls they are in love with are link to each other. After a few misjudgments of situations at hand Rajesh and Mahesh decides that they will bring Teesri Adalat to the court of law - at any cost. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Diljalaa
programme.desc: Mamta lives a middle-classed lifestyle in Bombay along with widower dad, Ratanmuni Gupta, who works as a Manager with Sharda Chemicals, while she studies in Lovedale College in Manori. Her dad wants her to marry a naive, semi-senile, Munna, the only son of widowed, Sharda, his employer. On the day of the engagement she humiliates her dad, Munna and Sharda and refuses to marry Munna. Shortly thereafter a number of young children die after being injected with medication from Sharda Chemicals, the Police investigate, arrest Sharda, while Munna kills himself. Ratanmuni and his partners, D.S. Mittal, Mehra, Radhey and Shyam, take over Sharda Chemicals and re-name it Friend's Chemicals. Sometime later when Mamta returns from Manori, her dad introduces her to wealthy Mrs. Modi, who wants her to wed her only son, Azad. Both Azad and Mamta approve of each other, meet with each other and get intimate. On the day of their engagement, many surprises await Mamta as she finds out that the man she got intimate with is not the real Azad, while the real Azad and his mom will have nothing to do with a now characterless Mamta. (Action,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Pyari Behna
programme.desc: Kaali lives a middle class and common-man life with his sister Seeta in a shanty house. He works at a small train station nearby with an Engineer called Vinay. Kaali is the eldest in his household and is stern and class-conscious about his sister with whom she meet and does not meet. One day he happen to meet up with Mangla, his sister's friend and leading companion, Mangla wanted to marry Kaali as she is in love with him but he does not have any interest over her. Kaali sister confronts him and he suddenly falls in love with Mangla and they both get married. A few days later Kaali reach with an accident and looses his left arm and he holds Vinay the Engineer responsible for the accident. Vinay, however falls head over heels in love with Kaali sister Seeta but Kaali reject him of having any relationship with his family since he is responsible for Kaali's condition. (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Ram Aur Shyam
programme.desc: Abused by an oppressive brother-in-law Gajendra (Pran), Ramchandra (Dilip Kumar) runs away from home, and ends up in a small village where he is mistaken for Shyamrao (also Dilip Kumar), and must accept Ganga (Leela Mishra) and his new name or face severe exorcism. Meanwhile, Shyamrao is mistaken for Ramchandra by Anjana (Waheeda Rehman) and her dad (Nazir Hussain). When Gajendra finds out, he is enraged and attempts to beat the stuffing out of the person he thinks is his brother-in-law, but Shyamrao refuses to be abused or beaten, and all of a sudden things start changing in the household as well as in the community. It is not long before Gajendra finds out about the truth, and plans an ugly death for Shyamrao, and all those opposed to him. (Comedy,Drama,Family)
